mapper.insert:
select addr_seq.nextval from dual
insert into addrbook(bookNo, fk_emp_no, deptName, posName, name, corp_phone, zipcode, address, addressDetail, hp, email, memo ) values(#{no}, #{fk_emp_no}, #{deptName}, #{posName}, #{name}, #{corp_phone},#{zipcode},#{address},#{addressDetail}, #{hp}, #{email},#{memo})
